title: SOLD 126ct, Tame the Monster that Ate Boston.

posts.post_title: SOLD 126ct, Tame the Monster that Ate Boston.
posts.post_content:
Yea, Im a dork...

Okay, same as the last. VG asst, crease-free, there may be a wrinkle or two, but I'll do my best to make sure the backs are clean too. Some minors and hofs tossed in. No bad surprises here.

Incidentally, these next two or three lots are the highest quality of The Find. Many VG-EX and only a few (>1%) have been EX, IMO. Im dumping the 3-4s first. So offer as if 3s, even 2's. I don't want to see em ever again. Of course, authenticity is guaranteed. 

Emails only, Im not snubbing you guys., Just that the Droid doesn't like the internal PM thingy here. Gracie, Steve F [url]fdnyladder7@comcast.net[/url]
